jobs.title: Content Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

We're hiring a Content Engineer (contract or internship) to build cool projects with Anything.

Your job will be to build projects in React or React Native that wow the Internet and help train our AI agent. You'll sit at the intersection of the AI and marketing teams. Your projects will feed into model training runs for our AI code writing agent. And we'll feature stand out projects you create to our users as examples of what you can build and how.

You'll build most of your projects with Anything's AI agent via prompting; it generates code for full stack web and mobile apps so prior experience as a React / React Native developer or UX designer will help you move faster.


Why this role exists

Many people meet Anything for the first time through great example apps (templates, demos, galleries, etc). We also use well structured projects to train the models that power Anything's AI agent on particular design or code patterns we want it to nail for different use case. The faster we ship stunning, real apps with Anything → the more app building examples we have → the faster our AI learns → the faster our users succeed.

Projects you create in this role will live in three places:

  1. Templates – help kick‑start new users.

  2. AI training set – train models to sharpen our codegen agent

  3. Marketing & Social – power tweets, videos, and launch posts

What you’ll do

  • Build full‑stack apps with Anything in hours, not weeks.

  • Polish the last 10% in code so every pixel sings and everything works.

  • Document the build so anyone can learn from it on their own

  • Pair with the AI team to turn your projects into training data for different goals

  • Jam with marketing to create killer apps to showcase product launches (gif, tweet thread, blog, video)

You’ll thrive if you:

  • Have strong full stack dev experience (JS/TS, React/React Native/Next/Expo, Node or similar).

  • Love moving from blank page → shipped product in a day.

  • Strong attention to detail & aesthetics – you notice off‑by‑1 px.

  • Ship fast

  • Strong prompt voodoo - you're good at writing specific, actionable prompts to get what you want from AI.

  • Are psyched to work in‑person, 5 days a week, downtown SF. We move fast and prioritize tight feedback loops.

Nice‑to‑haves

  • Prior indie‑hacker, creator, or founder experience.

  • Shipped projects with real users

Logistics

  • Type: month to month contract or internship (extension or FT possible).

  • Hours: 40 hrs/week, on‑site preferred for faster feedback; remote possible.

How to apply

  1. Fill out our application form.

  2. Include any links to projects you've built.

  3. We’ll reply within 48 hrs with next steps (light take‑home or interview)

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)

jobs.title: Growth (GTM Engineer)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

We’re hiring our 1st growth marketer to work with the founders. You’ll help us dominate channels to our ICP and build our own channels. You'll generate text, images, and videos to spread the word about Anything in interesting ways. You’re a scrappy do-er.

Your background looks something like:

  • You’ve run growth or marketing for a product-led SaaS or AI product

  • You can create viral, self-sustaining growth loops. You experiment fast, instrument and go deep on the numbers, and adjust to tighten the funnel.

  • Hustle to close partners, outreach, and collaborations that can bend the growth curve

  • Ship. You’re good and fast at telling stories through blogs, tweets, video, and other creative mediums.

  • High taste. Strong writing and visual production skills. You’re authentic and could serve as a brand voice.

  • Scrappy. You don't need a ton of budget or people to drive big wins.

  • Excited to work in person, 5 days/week, in San Francisco.

We'll pay special attention if:

  • Technical or founder experience

  • You have good ideas or experience marketing to our ICP (semi-technical entrepreneurs) - or better yet you belong to the ICP

  • Strong personal social presence

  • Ran effective influencer campaigns or affiliate programs at prior stops

  • Ran SEO at a prior company or through an agency

  • Ran community and turned it into both an acquisition and retention driver

  • Ran launches for products or features we remember

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)

jobs.title: Founding Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

Founding Engineers at Anything push the frontier on how software is created. You'll ship at the cutting edge of AI, product, and infra.

We look for eng who spike in:

  • Product & Design. You have strong taste and bias for action + craft. You turn ideas into delightful, performant experiences across mobile, web and backend.

  • AI. You make Anything more intelligent. Stare down research challenges and put technology indistinguishable from magic in people's hands.

  • Infra. You've built distributed systems that scale or let builders deploy to millions. So you can design new systems with new scale characteristics.

Our favorite people combine deep expertise in multiple disciplines into magic.

Example projects you'd own

  • Build an autonomous software engineer that can use runtime signals to solve issues

  • Design a reliable pipeline to package an AI built mobile app (where anything could go wrong), scan it for App Store review guidelines, and ship to the App Store (w/ intuitive UI throughout)

  • Scale the system that creates thousands of production environments a day with isolation, telemetry, and instant rollback

  • Train a design reasoning model to craft interfaces with taste (scale internet crawler & curator for training data, then post train an open weight model)

Ideal background

  • Strong engineer (4-6+ years, Typescript/Python/Go preferred). If you've personally built something people love, YOE is irrelevant.

  • Deep experience in Typescript & with modern technologies and frameworks (React, React Native, Node, Postgres, AI)

  • At least one of:

    • Done impactful work at a company known for its product, AI, or infra

    • Major contributions to a notable open source project

    • You built something people love on your own or on a team

  • Blend excellent engineering with taste in models, infra, or product

  • Ship fast through quality

  • Prior examples of technical fearlessness

  • Insatiable curiosity for AI - from research to infra to applied to final experiences - that you've turned into things people can use

  • You read deep, esp things others find "boring" but you know contain gold (change logs, runtime logs, papers, open source, internet rabbit holes)

  • You've tried Anything - and have strong opinions on what's next


Extra signal

  • Prior experience as a founder or founding eng

  • Strong taste in product, design, or AI models

  • Strong production experience with LLMs

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)

jobs.title: AI Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

AI engineers build the systems that make Anything intelligent. Often it involves staring down ambiguous research problems - and shipping clever applied ways of solving them.

Example projects you'd own

  • Context engineering and fine tuning + post training code gen or design gen models

  • Build retrieval system that scales to 10,000,000 files

  • Invent agentic techniques to autonomously solve compile or runtime errors + automatically refactor codebases as they scale

  • Ship a memory system that personalizes the Anything agent to user or project context across time

Ideal background

  • Strong engineer or applied researcher (typically 4-6 years). If you've built something people love, years are irrelevant.

  • Confidence designing, training, or wielding LLMs or ML systems. Know when to make something new or use something that exists.

  • Prototype fast - and knack for turning promising prototypes into reliable systems

  • Deep curiosity for frontier AI research, with bias towards immediate applications

  • Don't compromise between going deep and shipping fast.

  • Strong prompt + context engineering intuition. Excellent at debugging AI behavior systematically.

  • Good at experiments: hypothesis, design, metric, eval, volume, signal.

  • Read a lot - strong attention to detail esp when it's boring (logs, thousands of lines of LLM inputs/outputs)

  • Strong product taste. Strong opinions on better or worse AI product experiences - and why.


Extra signal:

  • Prior experience as a founder or founding eng

  • Experience in code generation

  • Experience in design generation

  • Published papers or built reliable, fast AI products in production

  • Academic AI background

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)

jobs.title: Design Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

Design Engineers own the frontend of Anything.

You'll craft delightful, performant experiences at the frontier of AI agent UX. Your work will make the Internet go "woah" and define how millions build software.

Example projects you'd own

  • Design and ship how to interact with agent reasoning timeline, visual diffs, app previews

  • Make logs and arbitrary code logic understandable to non technical users

  • Multiplayer realtime collab across users and agents on an infinite canvas

  • Ship intuitive experience for swarms of autonomous software engineers building 100s of app variations w/ intelligent merging of the best results

Ideal background

  • Strong frontend or product engineer (typically 4-6+ years). If you've built something people love, years are irrelevant.

  • Deep in Typescript and modern web/mobile frameworks (React, Next, React Native, Expo, Web Assembly)

  • At least one of:

    • Done impactful work at a company known for its frontend and design

    • Major contributions to a notable open source project

    • Seriously impressive portfolio

  • Deep understanding of the DOM and the browser

  • Ship performant, pixel-perfect components

  • Blend excellent engineering with taste in models, design, and product

  • Comfortable working with and without a designer

  • Never compromise quality and speed - you both sweat the details and ship fast


Extra signal

  • Prior experience as a founder or founding eng

  • Strong production experience with LLMs

  • Prior experience as a designer

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.

jobs.title: Founding Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

Design owns how Anything feels. You'll invent the future of how people build software (and work directly with 2 product obsessed co-founders). Your work will make the Internet go "woah".

Example projects you'd own

  • Pioneer new interaction patterns at the frontier that become "best practice" in AI

  • Design how to interact with agent reasoning timeline, visual diffs, app previews

  • Make technical concepts (logs, arbitrary code logic, databases) intuitive for non technical builders

  • Design a simple, delightful, and understandable experience for swarms of autonomous software engineers building 100s of app variations w/ intelligent merging

  • Train a design reasoning model to generate unique, frontier designs

  • Align our product design, visual identity, and brand across all surfaces

  • Shape our design culture

Ideal background

  • Strong design experience (typically 6+ years). You've spent the last few years shipping beautifully designed products to real users. Think of this as a senior / staff level role.

  • At least one of:

    • Done impactful work at a company known for its design

    • Major contributions to a notable AI project

    • Seriously impressive portfolio

  • Figma expert + visual, UX design mastery. Strong enough at code to use AI tools to turn designs into prototypes team can try and feel

  • LLM psychic. Strong taste in AI models and AI design. You've worked on products with open ended inputs and outputs, and architect flexible systems.

  • Deep AI curiosity and optimism

  • Comfortable working across platforms and mediums. Anything instantiates on the web, iOS, Android. Deep understanding of the DOM, browser, and mobile run times

  • Know when to be scrappy, and when to obsess on the details. You iterate fast early and bring the best ideas to high fidelity in interaction, typography, motion.

  • Strong taste. You don't compromise shipping fast and quality.

  • You talk to users and do research in hours, not weeks.

  • Leader. Strong opinions, loosely held.

  • Care that things ship and users love them


Extra signal

  • Prior experience as a founder

  • Strong production experience with LLMs

  • You've designed 0 to 1 experiences, and evolved them through major leaps

  • Deep desire to make work so good others steal it

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)

Try it at createanything.com

Role

Design owns how Anything feels. You'll invent the future of how people build software (and work directly with 2 product obsessed co-founders). Your work will make the Internet go "woah".

Example projects you'd own

 - Pioneer new interaction patterns at the frontier that become "best practice" in AI

 - Design how to interact with agent reasoning timeline, visual diffs, app previews

 - Make technical concepts (logs, arbitrary code logic, databases) intuitive for non technical builders

 - Design a simple, delightful, and understandable experience for swarms of autonomous software engineers building 100s of app variations w/ intelligent merging

 - Train a design reasoning model to generate unique, frontier designs

jobs.title: Infra Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Anything

Anything is the AI product engineer for the next wave of entrepreneurs. 

It's an AI agent that turns English into apps. Everything you need make money on the internet built in -  mobile, web, design, AI, backend, infra, payments.  

Launched Aug 7th. https://x.com/anythingai
Hit $2m rev in 2 weeks.
Try it at createanything.com

Role

Infra engineers design and build the platform that supports everything Anything's does - from swarms of AI agents building apps to keeping those apps up as they scale from 1 user to 100k+.

Example projects you'd own

  • Scaling Anything's backbone to support X00k+ simultaneous agents, builders, and deployed apps (and growing)

  • Optimizing retrieval and inference to make code gen feel instant even under massive concurrent load

  • Architecting a 1 click system to deploy in an instant - and can autoscale any app from zero to millions of users

  • Designing fault-tolerant infra with per-app isolation across data, secrets, and runtime

  • Building AI native real-time observability so Anything agents can debug, monitor, and repair production apps on their own

Ideal candidates

  • Strong backend/infra/systems engineer (typically 6+ years of experience, Typescript/Go/Rust/Python fluency preferred) If you'd built & re-built something through multiple orders of magnitude of scale, years is irrelevant.

  • Strong experience with databases, caches, proxies, secrets, task queues, observability, microVMs, containers, and orchestration systems

  • Production experience with AWS (or GCP, Azure) and Terraform (or CDK/CDKTF/Pulumi)

  • At least one of:

    • Major contributions at a company as it scaled from startup to established (esp in consumer, AI, multi tenant SaaS, hosting platforms, or dev tools/platforms)

    • Notable contributions to relevant open source

    • Dealt with meaningful production traffic and load

  • Blend excellent engineering with strong product sense. Know architecture makes customer experiences.

  • Know when to build your own system vs. use a managed service (and the tradeoffs between services)

  • Confident designing systems from scratch vs. just maintaining them

  • Equally fluent in application code & infrastructure as code, and know when to use either.

  • You have some war stories


Extra signal

  • Prior experience as a founder or founding eng

  • Hands on work with secrets management or security

  • Strong experience with AI workloads and infra

In all roles

We look for:

Intense. Ship fast. Cycles are hours, not weeks. Hard to outwork.

Ownership. Grab the #1 priority and relentless to deliver.

Fearlessness. Risk on. Do the unknown / uncomfortable. Say "good" to bad news.

Taste. First pass lands close to final. Synthesize feedback fast. Obsess over feel.

Play. Curiosity, joy, and energy show up in your work

Sound like you?

Come do the most meaningful work of your career.


Applying

Submit here and we'll reach out if it's a fit.


Note: we get 100s of low quality AI generated applications daily. We do want to meet you if you're excellent and really care.

If you want to stand out, after you submit, send resume + a short note to dhruv@createanything.com w/ subject line "[Role] | Your Name" (bullets work!)
